resources.string: You have just discovered the best-kept secret in self-improvement, cognitive enhancement, and stress-relief in the world.
The Total Embodiment Method TEM, born of elite Samurai awareness training in Japan.
The Total Embodiment Method TEM is a secret form of Samurai meditation unknown to all but the most highly trained practitioners of the ancient arts.!
Now, for the first time in history, the benefits of Total Embodiment Method TEM are available to you And it will change your life.

Richard L Haight, a top-level master instructor, trained and certified in Japan in four samurai arts, at the behest of his teacher, Osaki Shizen, is now sharing this incredible, ancient technology with the world before it is lost forever in the rush of modernity.
But what makes the Total Embodiment Method TEM different from other forms of meditation?
But before we get into what makes Total Embodiment Method TEM so powerful, letâ€™s first take a look at what is working well with other forms of meditation.
Did you know that scientific studies have verified the incredible power of meditation to improve your life?
Psychology Today provides us with a list of scientifically verified benefits from daily meditation
Increases immune function, Decreases pain, Decreases cellular inflammation
Increases positive emotion, Decreases depression, Decreases stress, Decreases anxiety, Gives perspective
